data.name: Pud Pud in Weird World
data.detailed_description:
Originally released in 1984 for the ZX Spectrum, this classic surreal platformer saw players take on the role of Pud Pud, a bizzare yellow ball-like creature with wings and a giant chomping mouth, trying to survive in the appropriately named Weird World. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version.

Gameplay

Explore the Weird World by walking or flying and find the 10 hidden bowls of pudding to find the secret exit. Some creatures can be eaten to replenish energy, while others damage you. Beware the fearsome Mrs Pud Pud, for her kiss is deadly!


This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including:

  • Saving/loading the game at any point
  • Support for most modern game controllers
  • Full control remapping
  • Image scaling and smoothing options

data.short_description: In this surreal platformer from 1984, explore the Weird World and its bizzare denizens to find the 10 hidden bowls of pudding and reveal the secret exit - but watch out! Mrs Pud Pud isn't too happy about you stealing her pudding, and her kiss is deadly!
